revised_title: Quadrature of the Parts of the Lunula of Hippocrates Chius
tldr: The authors present a method for finding the area of specific parts of the Lunula of Hippocrates Chius, a curved shape related to circles and triangles. They discuss the work of Mr. John Perks, Dr. David Gregory, and Mr. John Caswell, who each contributed to the development of this method. The authors demonstrate how this technique can be applied to other similar shapes and discuss the relationship between different types of curves and figures.
